summary.span: 表示句柄资源的包装类。

span.span: Represents a wrapper class for handle resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类与类相似, 不同之处在于实现引用计数。 The class is similar to the class, except that implements reference counting. 当你自行提供必要的同步时, 可以使用而不是来解决性能注意事项。You can use instead of to address performance considerations when you can provide the necessary synchronization more efficiently yourself. 因为类不会执行引用计数, 所以它不提供处理回收安全攻击的保护。Because the class does not perform reference counting, it does not provide protection from handle recycling security attacks. 由于引用计数算法隐式序列化操作, 因此还会丢失一定量的线程安全。Because the reference counting algorithm implicitly serializes operations, a certain amount of thread safety is also lost. 如果在另一个线程上未完成使用该句柄的操作时调用或方法, 或者如果同时从两个线程调用或, 则结果是不确定的。If you call the or method while an operation that is using the handle is outstanding on another thread, or if you call or from two threads at the same time, the results are non-deterministic. 类仍提供由类提供的有保证的关键终结。 The class still provides the guaranteed critical finalization provided by the class.

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 部分受信任的代码不能继承此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

permission.span: 需要对直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此类不能由部分受信任的或透明的代码使用。

span.span: This class cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 标记句柄，以便释放资源。

span.span: Marks the handle for releasing and freeing resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过调用或方法, 可以释放资源。 Calling the or method allows the resources to be freed. 与类不同, 此操作始终会立即发生, 因为没有引用计数来指示其他线程正在使用此句柄。Unlike the class, this will always happen immediately since there is no reference count to indicate that other threads are using this handle. 因此, 你必须使用同步机制来确保调用方法是安全的。Therefore, you must employ a synchronization mechanism to ensure it is safe to call the method. 尽管使用该类的大多数类不需要提供终结器, 但有时需要这样做 (例如, 刷新文件缓冲区或将某些数据写回内存中)。Although most classes that use the class do not need to provide a finalizer, this is sometimes necessary (for example, to flush out file buffers or to write some data back into memory). 在这种情况下, 类可以提供保证在关键终结器运行之前运行的终结器。In this case, the class can provide a finalizer that is guaranteed to run before the critical finalizer runs. 使用完对象后, 调用 或方法。 Call the or method when you are finished using the object. 方法使对象处于不可用状态。The method leaves the object in an unusable state. **注意**在释放对象 的最后一个引用之前, 请始终调用或。**Note** Always call or before you release your last reference to the object. 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's method.

summary.span: 标记句柄，以便释放资源。

span.span: Marks the handle for releasing and freeing resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过调用或方法, 可以释放资源。 Calling the or method allows the resources to be freed. 与类不同, 此操作始终会立即发生, 因为没有引用计数来指示其他线程正在使用此句柄。Unlike the class, this will always happen immediately since there is no reference count to indicate that other threads are using this handle. 因此, 你必须使用同步机制来确保调用方法是安全的。Therefore, you must employ a synchronization mechanism to ensure it is safe to call the method. 尽管使用该类的大多数类不需要提供终结器, 但有时需要这样做 (例如, 刷新文件缓冲区或将某些数据写回内存中)。Although most classes that use the class do not need to provide a finalizer, this is sometimes necessary (for example, to flush out file buffers or to write some data back into memory). 在这种情况下, 类可以提供保证在关键终结器运行之前运行的终结器。In this case, the class can provide a finalizer that is guaranteed to run before the critical finalizer runs. 使用完对象后, 调用 或方法。 Call the or method when you are finished using the object. 方法使对象处于不可用状态。The method leaves the object in an unusable state. **注意**在释放对对象的最后一个引用之前, 请始终调用或方法。**Note** Always call the or method before you release your last reference to the object. 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's method.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class specifying whether to perform a normal dispose operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应显式调用方法`disposing` , 参数设置为`false`。You should never explicitly call the method with the `disposing` parameter set to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 释放与句柄关联的所有资源。

span.span: Frees all resources associated with the handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是类的析构函数。 The method is the destructor for the class. 应用程序代码不应直接调用此方法。Application code should not call this method directly.

span.span: Specifies the handle to be wrapped.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不要公开句柄 (即派生类之外的句柄)。Do not expose the handle publicly (that is, outside of the derived class).

public: property bool IsClosed { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示句柄是否已关闭。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the handle is closed.

value.span: 如果句柄已关闭，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the handle is closed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个值, 该值指示对象的句柄是否不再与本机资源关联。 The method returns a value indicating whether the object's handle is no longer associated with a native resource. 这与属性的定义不同, 后者计算给定的句柄是否始终被视为无效。This differs from the definition of the property, which computes whether a given handle is always considered invalid. 此方法在以下`true`情况下返回值: The method returns a `true` value in the following cases: - 已调用方法。The method was called. - 调用了方法或方法, 但其他线程上没有对该对象的引用。The method or method was called and there are no references to the object on other threads.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsInvalid As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsInvalid { bool get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，获取一个值，该值指示句柄值是否无效。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the handle value is invalid.

value.span: 如果句柄有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the handle is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生类必须实现属性, 以便公共语言运行时能够确定是否需要关键终结。Derived classes must implement the property so that the common language runtime can determine whether critical finalization is required. 派生类必须提供满足其支持的常规句柄类型的实现 (0 或-1 无效)。Derived classes must provide an implementation that suits the general type of handle they support (0 or -1 is invalid). 然后, 可以进一步将这些类派生给特定的安全句柄类型。These classes can then be further derived for specific safe handle types. 与属性不同, 后者报告对象是否已使用基础句柄完成, 该属性计算给定的句柄值是否始终被视为无效。 Unlike the property, which reports whether the object has finished using the underlying handle, the property calculates whether the given handle value is always considered invalid. 因此, 对于任何一个句柄值, 属性始终返回相同的值。Therefore, the property always returns the same value for any one handle value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ReleaseHandle() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function ReleaseHandle () As Boolean

summary.span: 如果在派生类中重写，执行释放句柄所需的代码。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, executes the code required to free the handle.

returns.span: 如果句柄释放成功，则为 ；如果出现灾难性故障，则为 。

span.span: if the handle is released successfully; otherwise, in the event of a catastrophic failure, .

returns.span: 在这种情况下，它会生成 releaseHandleFailed 托管调试助手。

span.span: In this case, it generates a releaseHandleFailed Managed Debugging Assistant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法保证只调用一次, 前提是使用适当的同步机制来确保只对或方法进行一次调用。 The method is guaranteed to be called only once, provided that you employ proper synchronization mechanisms to ensure that only one call to the or method is made. 如果或属性为,`true`则不会调用方法。 The method will not be called if the or property is `true`. 在派生类中实现此方法可执行释放句柄所需的任何代码。Implement this method in your derived classes to execute any code that is required to free the handle. 由于的功能之一是确保防止资源泄漏, 实现中的代码必须永远不会失败。Because one of the functions of is to guarantee prevention of resource leaks, the code in your implementation of must never fail. 在对同时进行了垃圾回收的对象运行正常终结器后, 垃圾回收器将调用, 并保证资源调用它, 并且在进程正在进行时不会中断。The garbage collector calls after normal finalizers have been run for objects that were garbage collected at the same time, and guarantees the resources to invoke it and that it will not be interrupted while it is in progress. 在实例构造时, 此方法将准备为受约束的执行区域 (CER) (以及其可静态定义的调用关系图中的所有方法)。This method will be prepared as a constrained execution region (CER) at instance construction time (along with all the methods in its statically determinable call graph). 尽管这会阻止线程中止中断, 但你仍必须注意不要在重写的方法中引入任何错误路径。Although this prevents thread abort interrupts, you must still be careful not to introduce any fault paths in your overridden method. 特别是 , 将属性应用于从调用的任何方法。In particular, apply the attribute to any methods you call from . 在大多数情况下, 此代码应为:In most cases this code should be: `ReliabilityContract(Consistency.WillNotCorruptState, Cer.Success)` 此外, 对于简单清除 (例如, 在文件句柄上`CloseHandle`调用 Windows API), 可以检查单平台调用的返回值。Additionally, for simple cleanup (for example, calling the Windows API `CloseHandle` on a file handle) you can check the return value for the single platform invoke call. 对于复杂的清理, 可能会有大量程序逻辑和多种方法调用, 其中一些可能会失败。For complex cleanup, you may have a lot of program logic and many method calls, some of which might fail. 您必须确保您的程序逻辑具有适用于每种情况的后备代码。You must ensure that your program logic has fallback code for each of those cases. 如果出于任何原因`false`而返回[](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/releasehandlefailed-mda.md) 方法,它将生成releaseHandleFailed托管调试助手。If the method returns `false` for any reason, it generates a [releaseHandleFailed](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/releasehandlefailed-mda.md) Managed Debugging Assistant.

related.span: 用托管调试助手诊断运行时错误

span.span: Diagnosing Run-time Errors with Managed Debugging Assistants
ReleaseHandleFailed

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void SetHandle(native int handle) cil managed

param.name: handle
param.span: 要使用的预先存在的句柄。

span.span: The pre-existing handle to use.

summary.span: 将句柄设置为预先存在的指定句柄。

span.span: Sets the handle to the specified pre-existing handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当需要支持预先存在的句柄时 (例如, 如果结构中返回了句柄), 才能使用方法,因为.NETFrameworkCOM互操作基础结构不支持结构中的封送处理。Use the method only if you need to support a pre-existing handle (for example, if the handle is returned in a structure) because the .NET Framework COM interop infrastructure does not support marshaling handles in a structure.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetHandleAsInvalid() cil managed

span.span: Marks a handle as invalid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当你知道句柄无效, 并且想要将其标记为时, 才调用方法。Call the method only when you know that your handle is invalid and you want to mark it as such. 这样做不会更改字段的值, 而只会将句柄标记为无效。Doing so does not change the value of the field; it only marks the handle as invalid. 该句柄可能会包含可能的陈旧值。The handle might then contain a potentially stale value. 此调用的效果是, 不会尝试释放资源。The effect of this call is that no attempt is made to free the resources. 与方法一样, 仅当需要支持预先存在的句柄时才使用。As with the method, use only if you need to support a pre-existing handle.
